Exciting restaurants, shops and cafes, including the brand new Heirloom Market by Giant are all just steps outside the gates. Directly out the back gate you can enjoy the Schuylkill River Park, including the Award Winning Trail & Boardwalk, Markward playground, tennis courts & dog park! Do not miss your chance to live in Center City's premier gated community!

title: Vibrant condo nestled on one of the most gorgeous tree-lined streets
description: Vibrant condo nestled on one of the most gorgeous tree-lined streets in Philadelphia offers lots of open living space! This pet-friendly, 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, 2nd floor condo is bright and airy with tall ceilings, hardwood floors, lots of storage, and giant windows, making this a great home to entertain friends and family. The modern kitchen boasts granite counters, built-in stainless steel appliances, a sparkling backsplash, and an island with lots of storage and bar seating all while opening up to the spacious living room. In the bathroom you'll find classic tile floors, a rainfall shower, and a linen closet with the built-in washer/dryer. The large bedroom has plenty of space for all of your needs including two large closets! Among this condo's fantastic features is its exceptional location! With a walkability score of 99, you're close to Pennsylvania & Jefferson Hospitals, Tria Caf , Varga Bar, Kanella Grill, Cheu Noodle Bar, Greenstreet Coffee, Walnut Street Theater, Washington Square Park, the shops along 13th Street, South Street, Pine Street, and many more! title: Truly a DELUXE one bedroom CORNER UNIT at The Dorchester
description: Truly a DELUXE one bedroom CORNER UNIT at The Dorchester, one of Philadelphia's Rittenhouse Square's most exclusive addresses. This gorgeous corner unit has been completely renovated with top of the line appliances and natural materials. A marble entry greets you as you enter the condo and come into a large open-concept living room with eat-in kitchen and spacious dining room. This unit is highly upgraded from the five-inch wide real wooden plank floors, to the beautiful multi-tiered crown molding through the space. The kitchen is a chef's dream with plentiful granite counter-tops, a large breakfast bar island with seating for three, a lux Sub-Zero refrigerator, quiet close Kraft-Made cabinets and drawers, under cabinet lighting and a Bosch dishwasher. The kitchen also has a 48 bottle GE Profile wine refrigerator and an ASKO combo washer and dryer! No trips to the basement necessary! High-end lighting including recessed lights over the kitchen island, and multi-track and movable art lighting placed thoughtfully throughout the living space. The dining area is front and center to amazing downtown Philadelphia views! A stunning marble and granite bath is truly a spa-like experience. Enter the bath through a custom glass and wood pocket-door, and you'll notice the luxuriously large marble stall shower with multiple shower heads and sprays and a hand-held shower head. The spacious bedroom even has a view of Rittenhouse Square! The Dorchester lobby has just finished extensive renovations by acclaimed Philadelphia designer Marguerite Rogers who also designed the renowned Philadelphia restaurant, Rouge, which is steps away along with all that Rittenhouse Square has to offer!
